articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Silk Mill
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Silk Mill
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, provided field guidance to the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Silk Mill.
					 He went to the newly-built room for education in the revolutionary history and room dedicated to the history of the mill.
					
					 He said that there are many historic materials and data and that the immortal history of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il's guidance over the mill makes one know well about their noble outlook on the people and their great revolutionary career.
					
					 He stressed the need to intensify the education in the historic materials so that the employees of the mill can deeply cherish the pride and honor of working at the mill for which the great leaders had shown special care.
					
					 Going round different parts of the mill, he learnt in detail about its production and management.
					
					 He noted with high appreciation that the mill replaced the outdated facilities with invented modern and high-speed ones under a plan for putting the production processes on a modern and scientific basis to better its employees' working conditions and raise the production capacity and further improve the quality of products and newly established various processes to normalize the production, thus making positive contribution to solving the people's clothing problem.
					
					 He went round the newly-arranged production processes of sanitary goods.
					
					 The home-made production facilities and the quality of sanitary goods are of the world level, he said, adding this shows eloquently that there is no fortress unconquerable when the banner of the principle of giving priority to self-development is held higher.
					
					 He set forth the tasks facing the mill and relevant units, saying that the mill has a very important role to play for the improvement of the people's standard of living.
					
					 Every part of the mill is flawless and everything is perfect, he said, highly appreciating that it is the best in aspect of the cultured practice in production and life among factories he visited recently.
					
					 He had a photo session with the officials and employees of the mill, expressing belief that they would become a model for the whole country, dashing ahead by tightly holding the reins of Mallima provided by the Party like the preceding generation who had rushed ahead racing against the times running on Chollima given by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Accompanying him were Department Director An Jong Su and Vice Department Director Jo Yong Won of the Workers' Party of Korea Central Committee.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Minister Meets UN Resident Coordinator
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Minister Meets UN Resident Coordinator
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho met and had a talk with Tapan Mishra, UN resident coordinator and UNDP resident representative in the DPRK, who paid a courtesy call on him Tuesday.
					 Discussed at the talk were the issues arising in developing the cooperative relations between the DPRK and the UN organizations. Convinced there were that the cooperative efforts of the UN organizations would give support and encouragement to the Korean people in their struggle to build an economic giant with self-development.
					
					 The resident coordinator expressed his will to make positive contribution to promoting the wellbeing of the Korean people by making sure that the cooperation of UN organizations with the DPRK would be steadily and smoothly implemented in line with the purpose of development and the humanitarian idea in the future.

articles.title: Senior Researcher of Disarmament and Peace Institute of DPRK Foreign Ministry Raps U.S. Arms Build-up
articles.content:
Senior Researcher of Disarmament and Peace Institute of DPRK Foreign Ministry Raps U.S. Arms Build-up
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- Kim Hyon Su, senior researcher of the Disarmament and Peace Institute of the DPRK Foreign Ministry, made public a commentary critical of the U.S. arms build-up harassing peace and stability on the Korean peninsula and in the region.
					 The U.S. arms build-up which disturbs the peace and security and escalates the danger of war on the peninsula and in the region has reached a serious phase, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. nuclear-powered submarine Mississippi entered Pusan Port of south Korea on June 13.
					
					 The submarine with a displacement of 7,800 tons commissioned in 2012 is an up-to-date attack nuclear submarine of the U.S. Navy. Equipped with 12 cruise missile launchers and 4 torpedo launchers, the sub is capable of performing the mission of attacking warships and subs of the rival side and supporting special operations. 
					
					 The U.S. has introduced Stennis and Ronald Reagan nuclear carrier strike groups into south Korea and its vicinity for the first time in history. It announced that it would deploy Pacific reaction flotilla of the U.S. Third Fleet including cruise missile destroyers Spruance and Momsen in East Asia under the pretext of extending the operation theatre of the U.S. Seventh Fleet based in Japan and would dispatch more warships to this region.
					
					 It is well known that the U.S. "Asia-Pacific rebalancing strategy" which calls for deploying over 60 percent of its Navy in Asia-Pacific by 2020 is aimed at maintaining the political and military edge in this region and the DPRK is made its primary target.
					
					 At a time when a scenario for vicious "precision air raid operation" designed to "disable" the nuclear facilities and strategic means of the DPRK is openly advertised in the U.S., the up-to-date U.S. nuclear submarine entered a south Korean port, adding to the gravity of the prevailing situation.
					
					 A series of "war scenarios" against the DPRK worked out by the U.S. and the U.S. massive introduction of strategic assets into south Korea clearly prove that detente and security on the peninsula can not be ensured by the unilateral efforts of one party.
					
					 Much upset by the strong denunciation and criticism by the DPRK and regional countries, the U.S. painted Mississippi's entry into Pusan Port as a "port-call scheduled before several months" and "routine visit" but it is sheer sophism.
					
					 On the contrary, it goes to prove the fact that the U.S. is ceaselessly creating an evil cycle of confrontation and tensions on the Korean peninsula and in the region in a bid to hamstring at any cost the efforts of the DPRK for prosperity and carrying out Washington's scenario to bring down its social system in a premeditated and regular manner.
					
					 It is quite self-evident that the line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force is the only choice for defending the dignity and sovereignty of the nation and developing economy and improving the people's living standard as early as possible now that the U.S. persists in its frantic anti-DPRK moves.
					
					 It has become clearer that the U.S. perverted view on the DPRK is the main reason why tensions persist on the Korean peninsula so dangerously.
					
					 The U.S. made a very hasty and strategically wrong decision this time, too.
					
					 The DPRK is ready for both dialogue and physical action.
					
					 In case something undesirable happens on the peninsula, the U.S. will be held fully accountable for this.
					
					 If the U.S. wants to survive even now, it had better stop at once its frantic war moves against the DPRK to carry out its anachronistic and reckless scenario for dominating the world.

articles.title: UAWK Delegation Back Home
articles.content:
UAWK Delegation Back Home
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea (UAWK) led by Kil Sang Bong, vice-chairman of its Central Committee, returned home Tuesday after taking part in the Fourth Congress of the International Union of Agricultural and Foodstuff Workers held in Paris.

articles.title: Unha Seawater Swimming Pool
articles.content:
Unha Seawater Swimming Pool
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- The Unha Seawater Swimming Pool in Pothonggang District, Pyongyang is crowded with citizens these days.
					 The two-storied building has a swimming pool with 450 square meters in area on the first floor, sandy and pebbly areas for sunbathing on the second floor and various sudatoria.
					
					 Seawater pipelined from the West Sea of Korea is pure and clean, while sandy and pebbly areas remind visitors of beaches on the eastern coast of the country.
					
					 According to Cha Kum Hyang, head of the swimming pool, hundreds of people enjoy swimming in seawater everyday.
					
					 The swimming pool was built thanks to the loving care of leader Kim Jong Il who devoted his all to the well being of people, she said.
					
					 Kwon Yong Ho, a resident living in port city Wonsan, told KCNA:
					
					 Yesterday I saw an excellent performance at the Rungna Dolphinarium. But it is my surprise that I could enjoy seawater swimming even in Pyongyang. I am very satisfied and feel refreshed.
					
					 It is my firm determination to work harder to repay for all the loving care shown by the motherly party and state for the people.

articles.title: Pyongyang Mechanical Technology Exchange Company
articles.content:
Pyongyang Mechanical Technology Exchange Company
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- Demand for high-tech products developed by the Pyongyang Mechanical Technology Exchange Company in the DPRK is on a steady increase at home and abroad.
					 The products include hard alloy tools, electrode wire for EDN, 3D printer, mini-CNC milling machine and microwave drying and sterilizing device, said Ra Sung Il, director of the company. 
					
					 In a little more than one year, the company supplied over 40 kinds of high-tech products, like portable vibration meter and straight-line auto wine filler to different units, thus making contributions to modernizing their production processes, he noted, adding:
					
					 The filler, in particular, is getting highly appraised at not only foodstuff factories but cosmetics and pharmaceutical factories.
					
					 The company intends to collaborate with universities of different countries in the research into and scientific exchange on advanced technologies, including machine-designing and -building and development of nano-matters and software.

articles.title: Modernization of Fishery Encouraged
articles.content:
Modernization of Fishery Encouraged
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- Big efforts have been paid to putting fishery on a scientific basis in the DPRK.
					 The Sinpho Pelagic Fishery Complex established integrated production system consisting of management and marine control system, satellite data service for fish detection and meteorological information, port-monitoring and -controlling system, power control system, etc., which prove themselves very effective in running the complex.
					
					 The West Sea Barrage Office set up a remote-controlled movable framed net fish-breeding ground down the Taedong River, capable of producing tens of tons of Ryongjong fish, tilapia, catfish and mullet every year.
					
					 The fish-breeding ground with 16 framed nets is powered by solar energy.
					
					 Nampho University of Fisheries manufactured fan feeders and supplied them to fish farms in Nampho City, thus saving manpower and food and increasing productivity.
					
					 The Pupho Offshore Farm developed a new method conducive to increasing the rooting rate of tangle seedlings 3 times and their growth rate 1.4 times.

articles.title: Frame-working of Ophthalmic Hospital Completed
articles.content:
Frame-working of Ophthalmic Hospital Completed
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- The Ryugyong General Ophthalmic Hospital is now under construction in Pyongyang, the DPRK, which represents the loving care of the Workers' Party of Korea for the people.
					 Builders completed its carcass work in a little more than three months after finishing nearly 1,400 cubic meters of ground concrete tamping in 10-odd days.
					
					 When visiting the construction site of the hospital in May, supreme leader Kim Jong Un called for building the hospital as the best one for the people.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S. Nuclear War Drills
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S. Nuclear War Drills
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the U.S. nuclear maniacs worked out a scenario for "precision air raid operation" against the nuclear and military facilities of the DPRK and are now busy with actual drills to put it into practice.
					 A formation of nuclear strategic bombers B-52H under the 8th Air Force of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces on Guam was busy with a nuclear bomb dropping drill in south Korea on June 17 under the pretext of the exercise for long-range flight and strike at strategic targets.
					
					 The U.S. introduced nuclear-powered submarine Mississippi capable of mounting a nuclear attack on the rival side into Pusan Port of south Korea on June 13.
					
					 Commenting on this muscle flexing, Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes:
					
					 The above-said facts go to clearly prove that the U.S. is making great haste to put its nuclear war scenario into practice.
					
					 The DPRK, however, remains unfazed by the U.S. nuclear war moves such as "precision air raid operation." 
					
					 The DPRK is fully ready to cope with the nuclear war scenario of the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 The Korean People Army has long put into the range of its precision strike the U.S. aggression and logistic bases against the DPRK, including the Anderson air force base on Guam where B-52Hs are deployed and the naval base for nuclear-powered submarines.  
					
					 The provocateurs should be aware of the disastrous consequences to be entailed by the nuclear war to be recklessly ignited by the U.S. imperialists. There is the need for the nuclear maniacs to recall the results of the computer simulated war played by the U.S. Defense Department against the DPRK in the 1990s before it joined the ranks of nuclear weapons states that the war left 100 000 U.S. service members dead and hundreds of thousands of others wounded. 
					
					 If the U.S. ruling quarters make desperate efforts to save their hostile policy toward the DPRK from bankruptcy through a nuclear war racket, the DPRK will take the toughest counteraction to bring the U.S. final destruction.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slashes at S. Korean Puppet Forces' "Diplomacy for Pressurizing North"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slashes at S. Korean Puppet Forces' "Diplomacy for Pressurizing North"
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet ruling quarters are desperately pursuing "diplomacy for pressurizing the north" aimed to stifle the DPRK in conspiracy with outsiders, turning down the proposal for reconciliation and unity made by compatriots, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an article, adding: 
					 This is an intolerable provocation and a blatant challenge to the goodwill of the DPRK to defuse tension on the Korean peninsula and improve the inter-Korean relations through dialogue and negotiations.
					
					 The south Korean authorities' "diplomacy for pressurizing the north" is a ridiculous act of the fools as they fail to judge the trend of the times.
					
					 Their desperate bid to "pressurize the north", being backed by outsiders, is no more than a wriggling of a drowning man trying to catch at a straw.
					
					 It is also a despicable act of dolts unaware of the domestic and foreign public's unanimous condemnation and snub at them. 
					
					 Nothing can stop the DPRK from dynamically advancing, demonstrating the might of a nuclear power, pursuant to the line of simultaneously developing the two fronts. The puppet forces' "diplomacy for pressurizing the north" is bound to go bust.
					
					 The south Korean authorities would be well advised to halt the foolish and mean "diplomacy", though belatedly, well aware that neither "sanctions" nor "pressure" can prevent the service personnel and people of the DPRK from dynamically advancing along the road of independence, Songun and socialism.
					
					 The Koreans will never pardon the south Korean conservative authorities desperately working to boost cooperation with outsiders in the confrontation with the DPRK, swimming against the trend of times.

articles.title: Minju Joson Accuses U.S. of Patronizing Japan's Moves to Emerge Military Giant
articles.content:
Minju Joson Accuses U.S. of Patronizing Japan's Moves to Emerge Military Giant
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- The U.S. drew Japan into a joint military maneuver in the Pacific, according to foreign press reports. Not long ago the U.S. lifted the ban on the import of parts of weapons from Japan.
					 This allows Japan's munitions industries to deliver those parts to their U.S. counterparts as much as possible.
					
					 Minju Joson Tuesday says in a commentary that this shows ever-closer military cooperation between the U.S. and Japan.
					
					 The conspiracy and nexus between them in the efforts to realize their wild ambitions for aggression are nothing new, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 Since the end of the Second World War the U.S.-Japan collusion and nexus have changed in their nature due to the marriage between the villainous U.S. and its shrewd servant Japan but they remain unchanged in their purpose.
					
					 Japan has pushed forward its conversion into a military giant step by step with the backing of the U.S., calculating that Tokyo can realize its wild ambition for reinvasion after shaking off its ill-fame of being a war criminal state only when it zealously pursues the U.S. scenario for world domination. The U.S. on its part has zealously connived and patronized Japan in its moves to emerge a military giant with the calculation that the U.S. can easily carry out its strategy for dominating Asia by using Japan as a shock brigade.
					
					 This U.S. strong backing is little short of giving full rein to the Japanese reactionaries who have secured a legal foundation for reinvasion by adopting the "security legislation".
					
					 The U.S., however, should bear in mind that it nourishes a viper in its bosom.
					
					 It is clear as a pikestaff that the U.S. will be a target of retaliation from Japan when the latter spurts poison from its venomous teeth of militarism in a bid to seek revenge for its defeat as it was the former's rival during the Second World War.

articles.title: Accidents, Violence Rife in S. Korean Puppet Marine Corps
articles.content:
Accidents, Violence Rife in S. Korean Puppet Marine Corps
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- Accidents and violence are reported in an unbroken chain in the 6th Brigade of the south Korean puppet Marine Corps (MC), according to south Korean Yonhap News.
					 A hand grenade exploded inside the barracks of a guard unit stationed on Taechong Island on June 13, destroying facilities there.
					
					 A drunken corporal who had no driving license drove a truck on Paekryong Island on December 20 last year, causing an accident which left five persons wounded. 
					
					 On November 26 two assistant commissioned officers assaulted a new corporal on the roadside near an oil station on the island several times.

articles.title: Retaliatory Suppression of Progressive Forces Kicked up in S. Korea
articles.content:
Retaliatory Suppression of Progressive Forces Kicked up in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet police authorities searched more than 10 places including the office rooms of civic and social organizations including the Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society on June 16, according to the south Korean Yonhap News.
					 The police authorities perpetrated such violence for the reason that the 2016 Citizens Network for General Elections, a group of progressive organizations, staged a campaign to bring a defeat to the conservative ruling party, held a rally and conducted opinion poll during the "National Assembly" election in April.

articles.title: S. Korean Opposition Parties Condemns Puppet Police Suppression
articles.content:
S. Korean Opposition Parties Condemns Puppet Police Suppression
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- Opposition parties in south Korea condemned the puppet police for suppressing the organizations which were involved in the campaign to punish those who went against the people's mind-set during the April 13 general elections.
					 The floor leader of the Minju Party of south Korea recalled at a meeting of the emergency measure committee held at the "National Assembly" on June 17 that the police carried out a search and confiscation operation against the offices of the organizations including the Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society on the previous day, and questioned for what purpose they made such investigation.
					
					 The co-representative of the Party of People at a meeting held at the "National Assembly" that day angrily asked if such police suppression was not intended to gag the people.
					
					 A spokesman for the Party of Justice held a press conference on June 16 at which he declared it was a problem for the police to regard it as illegal to verify and assess the qualifications of lawmakers of the "NA," adding that it was hardly understandable for the police to resort to such excessive investigation as search and confiscation.

articles.title: Conclusion of Peace Agreement, Withdrawal of U.S. Troops from S. Korea Called for
articles.content:
Conclusion of Peace Agreement, Withdrawal of U.S. Troops from S. Korea Called for
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- Foreign personages who took part in the international seminar on peaceful reunification held a meeting outside the U.S. embassy in Seoul on June 17 demanding the conclusion of a peace agreement, withdrawal of the U.S. forces from south Korea and implementation of the June 15 joint declaration, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Saram Ilbo.
					 The chairman of the organizing committee of the seminar said that the seminar which took place in Seoul from June 14 to 17 helped clarify the U.S. was to blame for the division of Korea, it partitioned Korea into the south and the north to meet its requirements and the division, the hostile relations and the danger of war that have lasted for more than seven decades on the Korean peninsula were attributable to the U.S. strategy for world domination.  
					
					 In order to put an end to the division and achieve peace on the Korean peninsula it is necessary for the U.S. to come out for the conclusion of a peace agreement as it is chiefly responsible for them, he added.
					
					 The implementation of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration is the only way for achieving peaceful reunification, he noted.
					
					 A spokesman for the Alliance of Immediate Action against War and Racial Discrimination referred to street demonstrations under way in the U.S. for the conclusion of a peace agreement, demanding the U.S. troops go back to Washington at once as they are tormenting the south Koreans.
					
					 A French historian said that it is not the north but the U.S. which should realize denuclearization first in order to bring about genuine denuclearization in Korea. The north should be given the right to develop its resources and nukes, he asserted.
					
					 The co-representative of the Korea Solidarity for Independent Reunification and Democracy read out a statement.

articles.title: Brief Biography of Kim Jong Il Introduced by Bulgarian Body
articles.content:
Brief Biography of Kim Jong Il Introduced by Bulgarian Body
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- The Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association carried the brief biography of leader Kim Jong Il on the June issue of its bulletin on the occasions of the 52nd anniversary of his start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 16th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Lauded by Bulgarian, Danish and Finnish Figures
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Lauded by Bulgarian, Danish and Finnish Figures
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- Meetings were held by the Bulgarian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association and a seminar held by the Finnish National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea on June 14 on the occasions of the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 16th anniversary of the publication of the historic June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 The chief of the Bulgarian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism introduced the brief biography of Kim Jong Il and praised his exploits for the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence.
					
					 The chairman of the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association said that Kim Jong Il conducted energetic activities to develop the WPK into the invincible party in his early years at the Central Committee of the WPK.
					
					 The exploits performed by Kim Jong Il in building and leading the party are shining along with his august name, the chairman noted.
					
					 The chairman of the Finnish National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea lauded Kim Jong Il as an outstanding leader who made great contributions to the victorious advance of the Korean revolution and the accomplishment of the cause of global independence.
					
					 The chairman said that the WPK has been developed into the Juche-oriented revolutionary party and the Juche idea developed into the great revolutionary idea representing the era of independence since Kim Jong Il started his work at the WPK Central Committee.
					
					 Congratulatory messages to supreme leader Kim Jong Un were adopted at the events held in Denmark and Finland.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Party-Building Exploits Praised by Foreign Newspapers
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Party-Building Exploits Praised by Foreign Newspapers
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- Foreign newspapers dedicated special write-ups to the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) on June 14.
					 The Iranian newspaper Iran News carried an article titled "Leader Kim Jong Il and the WPK" illustrated with his photo.
					
					 It said that his start of work at the Central Committee of the WPK on June 19, 1964 marks a very significant event in developing the WPK.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 Under his leadership the WPK invariably enforced the popular policies such as free medical care system and free education system even in the days when the DPRK faced the worst difficulties due to the imperialists' vicious anti-socialist offensive.
					
					 The WPK could demonstrate its dignity as the powerful party which has led the socialist cause to victory, enjoying the people's absolute support and trust.
					
					 The Pakistani newspaper Election Times said in an article that he regarded it as the most important task to develop the WPK into the party of President Kim Il Sung, its founder, both in name and in reality in the whole course of leading it, and successfully realized it.
					
					 His party-building exploits will shine along with socialist Korea winning victory after victory, the newspaper added.
					
					 The Bangladeshi newspaper Dainik Probat in an article praised him for building the WPK into the Juche-oriented revolutionary party and dignified mother party.

articles.title: Important Days of DPRK Marked in Bulgaria
articles.content:
Important Days of DPRK Marked in Bulgaria
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- The Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association issued the June issue of its bulletin on the occasions of the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the 16th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 An article titled "June 19, significant day for DPRK" said that Kim Jong Il developed the WPK into the party carrying out the idea and guidance of the leader, the party enjoying absolute support and trust of the people and the invincible and iron-willed party.
					
					 He pursued the original Songun politics in all fields in the arduous period when the imperialists went more reckless in their moves to stifle Korea-style socialism, thereby defending socialist Korea and peace and security of the world, the article noted, adding:
					
					 All the successes achieved by the Korean people for the past decades are the fruition of his leadership.
					
					 Another article said he made indefatigable efforts to achieve the reunification of the country, the cherished desire of the Korean people.
					
					 Thanks to his bold patriotic decision the north-south summit was held in Pyongyang in June, 2000 which resulted in the adoption of the June 15 joint declaration, and the October 4 declaration was adopted in 2007.
					
					 The joint declarations made it possible to bring earlier the day when the Korean people's dream of achieving the peaceful reunification and building a reunified power comes into a reality, adorning a brilliant page in the Korean history.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits for National Reunification Introduced by German Bodies
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits for National Reunification Introduced by German Bodies
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- The German Group for the Study of Korean Culture posted articles on the website of the MS Travel Company of Germany on June 10 and 13 on the occasion of the 16th anniversary of publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 An article titled "Fresh era of independent reunification" said:
					
					 Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il devoted himself to accomplishing the cause of Korea's reunification.
					
					 He firmly defended safety of the country and the nation under the banner of Songun, provided the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration, the programme for implementing it, and thus ushered in the era of By the Korean Nation Itself and the new era of independent reunification. This is the great exploit performed by him.
					
					 All the Koreans in the north, the south and abroad followed him as the lodestar of reunification, and the spirit for reunification against the U.S. ran high in south Korea.
					
					 He is always alive, enjoying the boundless reverence by the Korean nation and world progressives as a peerless patriot.
					
					 Another article titled "Realistic proposal for Korea's reunification" said that it is not only the cherished desire of the Korean people but also the demand of the world progressive humankind to put an end to the confrontation between the north and the south and reunify Korea.
					
					 It went on;
					
					 The DPRK had made all sincere efforts for the reunification on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 In order to reunify Korea, all the Korean people in the north, the south and abroad should turn out as one in the sacred struggle for reunification and replace the Armistice Agreement with a peace treaty and drive the U.S. troops out of south Korea.

articles.title: June 15 North-South Joint Declaration Should Be Implemented: Russian Body
articles.content:
June 15 North-South Joint Declaration Should Be Implemented: Russian Body
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- The June 15 North-South Joint Declaration should be thoroughly implemented for Korea's reunification.
					 The Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea noted this in a statement on June 16.
					
					 The statement said that the June 15 north-south joint declaration adopted in June, 2000 was a landmark for Korea's reunification.
					
					 It said that the declaration adopted and published thanks to the noble and patriotic will and bold decision of leader Kim Jong Il for national reunification is of great significance in the history of the movement for Korea's reunification.
					
					 Exchange and cooperation between the north and the south of Korea became brisk thanks to the adoption of the declaration.
					
					 And a bright prospect for realizing national reunification according to the three charters for Korea's reunification was opened.
					
					 The October 4 declaration, a programme for implementing the June 15 joint declaration, was adopted in 2007.
					
					 The once brisk north-south exchange and cooperation were blocked by the anti-reunification forces that took power in south Korea. 
					
					 The DPRK, the fortress of socialism, is making strenuous efforts for the peaceful reunification of the country.
					
					 The Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea stressed once again the issue of achieving the reunification of Korea by the efforts of the nation itself.

articles.title: Russian Organization Slams U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK
articles.content:
Russian Organization Slams U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- The Russian Group for Solidarity with the DPRK issued a statement on June 16 on the occasion of the June 25-July 27 month of the anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					 The world remembers June 25, 1950, the statement said, disclosing the fact that the U.S. committed brigandish subversive act to stifle the DPRK. 
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The Korean people frustrated the invasion by the U.S. imperialists and their followers and defended the country's independence and gains of the revolution under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung and the Workers' Party of Korea, enjoying unanimous support from the people in fraternal socialist countries and progressive mankind. 
					
					 And the Korean people made great contribution to preserving global peace. 
					
					 During over six decades after the war, the U.S. aggressive policy against the DPRK has remained unchanged.
					
					 The U.S. which put south Korea under its military control has staged provocative military drills getting on the nerves of the DPRK and persistently resorted to economic blockade.
					
					 It also continuously introduced war equipment for aggression into south Korea.
					
					 All the facts go to clearly prove who is the chief criminal escalating the tension on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 We condemn the U.S. hostile policy toward socialist Korea.
					
					 The U.S. should understand that it can never realize its ambition to dominate the world.
					
					 We hope that the DPRK's economy and national defence would grow stronger as they serve as a guarantee for peace on the peninsula and steers the world socialist movement.

articles.title: Korea's Reunification Supported by Newspapers of Iran, Bangladesh
articles.content:
Korea's Reunification Supported by Newspapers of Iran, Bangladesh
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- Newspapers of Iran and Bangladesh carried articles on June 13 on the occasion of the 16th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 The Iranian newspaper Iran News said in an article titled "Basic idea of Korea's reunification":
					
					 By Our Nation Itself is the basic idea of Korea's reunification.
					
					 The June 15 joint declaration whose core is By Our Nation Itself was adopted at the north-south summit in June, 2000, the first in its kind since the division of Korea.
					
					 The idea of By Our Nation Itself clarifies that the reunification issue should be solved independently by the joint efforts of the Korean nation.
					
					 By Our Nation Itself reflects the idea of national independence, great national unity and peace.
					
					 The independent and peaceful reunification of the Korean nation can be achieved only by the great national unity.
					
					 The north and the south should pool their efforts for neutralizing the U.S. nuclear threat and driving the U.S. troops and war hardware out of south Korea to eradicate the root cause of war.
					
					 Korea's independent and peaceful reunification, and peace and stability on the Korean peninsula and in Northeast Asia and other parts of the world can come true under the banner of By Our Nation Itself.
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un said in his report to the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea on the work of the Central Committee that the north and the south should respect each other and, as partners in national reunification, work together to open a new phase in improving inter-Korean relations and reunifying the country. 
					
					 The Bangladeshi newspaper Daily Industry in an article introduced By Our Nation Itself, the main spirit of the June 15 joint declaration, adding that Korea has not been reunified due to the south Korean authorities kowtowing to foreign forces and inciting confrontation with the compatriots in the north, and the foreign forces disturbing Korea's reunification although 70 years have passed since the nation was divided.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Introduced by German Body
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Introduced by German Body
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- The full text of President Kim Il Sung's work "Let the North and the South Open the Way to Peace and the Reunification of the Country in a United Effort" was posted by the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany on its website on June 15, the 16th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 The work published on Feb. 20, Juche 81 (1992), says that in order to achieve the peace and reunification of the country with the concerted efforts the north and south should firmly maintain their independent stand, take substantial measures to ensure peace in the country and achieve the great national unity irrespective of ideology and system.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige Hilanderia Kim Jong Suk de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige Hilanderia Kim Jong Suk de Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 21 de junio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno la Hilanderia Kim Jong Suk de Pyongyang.
					Recorrio la sala de educacion en la historia revolucionaria y la otra de presentacion del historial, nuevamente acondicionadas.
					
					En la primera sala, el Mariscal dijo que son muchos los datos historicos y las indelebles huellas de direccion del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, impregnadas en la fabrica, hacen conocer bien sus nobles concepciones del pueblo y sus vidas revolucionarias y sentir con carne propia el hecho de que nuestro pueblo ha vivido bajo la guia del padre tan afectuoso como lider.
					
					Subrayo la necesidad de hacer bien la educacion en los objetos historicos para que los obreros de la fabrica vivan y luchen con el orgullo y dignidad de trabajar en la fabrica que estaba bajo la especial atencion del Presidente y el Dirigente.
					
					El Mariscal estuvo en varios puntos de la fabrica haciendo detallado conocimiento del estado de produccion y las actividades de gestion.
					
					Basandose en el plan para modernizar y cientifizar los procesos de produccion la fabrica elimino los equipos viejos e invento, introdujo, fabrico e instalo los modernos equipos de gran velocidad mejorando asi las condiciones de trabajo de los empleados y elevando considerablemente la capacidad productiva y la calidad de los articulos, dijo y evaluo el hecho de que contribuyo activamente a la solucion del problema del vestido del pueblo preparando de nuevo varios procesos productivos y normalizando la produccion.
					
					Tambien, el Mariscal recorrio el moderno proceso de produccion de articulos higienicos, nuevamente establecido.
					
					Senalo que estan en nivel mundial no solo las instalaciones de produccion de articulos higienicos, fabricadas con las fuerzas y tecnologia propias, sino que tambien la calidad de sus productos. Agrego que este hecho demuestra elocuentemente que no hay baluarte inconquistable solo cuando enarbolan la bandera de dar prioridad al autofortalecimiento.
					
					Destaco que la fabrica cumple un rol importante en los trabajos para mejorar la vida del pueblo y presento las tareas que se presentan ante la fabrica y ramas concernientes.
					
					Se refirio a que todas las partes de la fabrica son perfectas y le gusta todo y anadio que esta planta esta en nivel supremo tanto en la produccion como en la cultura productiva y de vida, de entre las fabricas visitadas por el en los ultimos dias.
					
					Expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que los funcionarios y obreros de la fabrica marcharan vigorosamente a bordo de Mallima preparado por el partido como los miembros de las generaciones anteriores quienes acortaban el tiempo montando Chollima preparado por el Presidente y el Dirigente, y asi seran ejemplos de todo el pais tambien en la epoca de Mallima como lo hicieron en la epoca de Chollima, y se fotografio junto a ellos.
					
					Le acompanaron el jefe de departamento del Comite Central del PTC, An Jong Su, y el subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Jo Yong Won.

articles.title: Investigador coreano denuncia aumento armamentista de EE.UU. en Peninsula Coreana
articles.content:
Investigador coreano denuncia aumento armamentista de EE.UU. en Peninsula Coreana
Pyongyang, 21 de junio (ACNC) -- Kim Hyon Su, investigador superior del Instituto de Desarme y Paz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, hizo publico un comentario revelando y criticando el aumento armamentista de Estados Unidos que pone en peligro la paz y estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y la region.
					Llega a la etapa grave el aumento armamentista de EE.UU. que busca la guerra, reitera el investigador y prosigue:
					
					El dia 13, el submarino nuclear norteamericano Mississippi llego al Puerto de Pusan del Sur de Corea.
					
					Mississippi, que entro en armada en 2012, tiene un tonelaje de 7 mil 800 y esta equipado con los aparatos de lanzamiento simultaneo de 12 misiles cruceros y 4 lanzatorpedos. Tiene por su mision atacar los buques de guerra y submarinos del rival y asegurar al mismo tiempo el cumplimiento de operaciones especiales.
					
					Llegaron al Sur de Corea y su contorno por primera vez en la historia las flotillas de portaaviones nucleares norteamericanos Stennis y Ronald Reagan.
					
					Bajo el pretexto de ampliar el teatro operacional de la septima flota de las fuerzas maritimas de EE.UU. con su base en Japon, fueron ubicadas en Asia oriental las escuadras de reaccion en el Pacifico de la tercera flota que incorpora los destructores provistos de misiles cruceros Spruance y Momsen. 
					
					EE.UU. esta anunciando que seguira despachando a esa region mucho mas buques de guerra.
					
					Es conocido que la "estrategia de reequilibrio de Asia-Pacifico" de EE.UU., que pretende desplegar en esta region mas de 60% de sus fuerzas maritimas hasta el ano 2020, tiene como su objetivo mantener la hegemonia politico-militar en la region y toma a la RPDC como el blanco de primer golpe.
					
					Ultimamente, se divulga abiertamente en EE.UU. el plan de "operacion de ataque aereo de precision", cuya mision principal reside en "exterminar" las instalaciones nucleares y los medios estrategicos de la RPDC. Si se toma en cuenta este hecho, resulta mas grave la llegada al Sur de Corea del submarino nuclear ultramoderno dotado de misiles cruceros que son medios principales para cumplir la susodicha mision.
					
					EE.UU. inventa sin cesar diferentes "guiones de guerra" contra la RPDC e introduce en el Sur de Corea sus armas estrategicas, lo cual evidencia que con los esfuerzos unilaterales de una parte no se puede aliviar la tension ni preservar la seguridad en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Perplejo ante la fuerte condena y critica de la RPDC y otros paises regionales, EE.UU. dice que la entrada de Mississippi en el Puerto de Pusan es una "visita normal y planeada ya hace varios meses".
					
					Tal sofisma comprueba que el imperio norteamericano se dedica de manera planificada y cotidiana a la campana anti-RPDC con el proposito de crear de continuo el circulo vicioso de enfrentamiento y agravacion de tension en la Peninsula Coreana y su contorno, impedir la prosperidad de la RPDC y derrocar su regimen al final.
					
					Ya que continuan las maniobras anti-RPDC, esta mantendra con mas firmeza su linea de desarrollo paralelo de la construccion economica y las fuerzas armadas nucleares, la cual es la unica opcion para defender la dignidad y soberania de la nacion y mejorar cuanto antes la vida de la poblacion.
					
					Se hizo mas evidente que la repetida agravacion de tension en la Peninsula Coreana se debe al criterio hostil de EE.UU. sobre la RPDC.
					
					Esta vez tambien, EE.UU. tomo una decision frivola y equivocada en lo estrategico.
					
					La RPDC esta preparada tanto para el dialogo como para las medidas fisicas.
					
					Si en la Peninsula Coreana acontece lo que nadie desea, su responsabilidad recaera totalmente sobre EE.UU.
					
					Si EE.UU. quiere sobrevivir, debera abandonar de inmediato sus anacronicas e imprudentes maniobras belicas anti-RPDC que se orientan a la toma de hegemonia mundial.

articles.title: Minju Joson acusa a EE.UU. de cobijar acciones militaristas de Japon
articles.content:
Minju Joson acusa a EE.UU. de cobijar acciones militaristas de Japon
Pyongyang, 21 de junio (ACNC) -- Segun fuentes extranjeras, Estados Unidos involucro a Japon en los ejercicios militares conjuntos que se efectuan en el Oceano Pacifico. 
					Hace poco, EE.UU. cancelo la medida de restringir la importacion de accesorios de arma de Japon. Como resultado, las empresas japonesas de industria belica pueden suministrar a sus homologas norteamericanas todas las piezas de armamento que quisieran.
					
					En un comentario individual divulgado el dia 21, el rotativo Minju Joson revela que tales hechos insinuan que se estrechan mas las relaciones de cooperacion militar EE.UU.-Japon.
					
					No es nueva la colaboracion de esos paises que persiguen sendas ambiciones de agresion, comienza el comentarista y prosigue:
					
					Despues de la II Guerra Mundial, el aspecto de relaciones entre EE.UU. y Japon se ha convertido en el de la cooperacion entre el amo y su lacayo, pero no se han cambiado sus objetivos.
					
					Japon viene impulsando poco a poco la conversion en potencia militar pensando que podria realizar su ambicion de reagresion saliendo del estado de pais criminal de guerra si se suma activamente a las maniobras de EE.UU. para tomar la hegemonia mundial.
					
					Por su parte, EE.UU. viene defendiendo tal comportamiento de Japon creyendo que si usa como brigada de choque al pais isla, le sera mas facil cumplir la estrategia de dominar a Asia.
					
					El respaldo activo de EE.UU. alienta cada vez mas a Japon que habia preparado ya la base legal de reagresion al adoptar la "ley de seguridad".
					
					Resulta evidente que EE.UU. sera el blanco de represalia del Japon militarista, su otrora rival de la II Guerra Mundial que siempre busca la oportunidad de tomar desquite de su derrota.

articles.title: Fracasara "diplomacia de presion anti-Norte" de Sur de Corea, enfatiza Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Fracasara "diplomacia de presion anti-Norte" de Sur de Corea, enfatiza Rodong Sinmun 
Pyongyang, 21 de junio (ACNC) -- Los gobernantes surcoreanos arman la farsa de "diplomacia de presion anti-Norte" en confabulacion con las fuerzas extranjeras, en lugar de aceptar la propuesta de la parte connacional por la reconciliacion y unidad nacionales.
					El diario Rodong Sinmun, en un articulo individual de este martes, lo califica de intolerable desafio a la buena bondad de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea que desea aliviar la tension de la Peninsula Coreana y mejorar las relaciones intercoreanas mediante el dialogo y negociaciones, y continua:
					
					La "diplomacia de presion anti-Norte" es un acto ridiculo e inutil de los ignorantes de la corriente de la epoca.
					
					Nadie puede detener el avance vigoroso de la RPDC, potencia nuclear que marcha con la linea de desarrollo paralelo de la construccion economica y la de las fuerzas armadas nucleares. Y la "diplomacia de presion anti-Norte" no puede eludir el fracaso. 
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas deben abandonar esta farsa pueril teniendo presente que no pueden frenar con la "sancion" y la "presion" de toda indole la marcha impetuosa de nuestro ejercito y pueblo por la unica senda de la independencia, el Songun y el socialismo. 
					
					La nacion coreana no tolerara nunca la locura criminal de las autoridades conservadoras surcoreanas que se entregan a la confabulacion anti-RPDC junto con las fuerzas extranjeras.
